column4: trying to use smbclient to connect to my windows box - would use GUI but it doesn't support the dollar sign in a share name, and im trying to connect to the hidden drive share T$. i did "smbclient \\\\retrocomputer\\t$ -U=<My Username> <My Password>" and it tosses back NT_STATUS_CONNECTION_REFUSED
if your using homegroups or whatever you call it, samba doesnt work with it
